attributes.action: create a recovery tax of bail-outs of financial instiututions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a new recovery tax from industries that have required Government funding to maintain those industries in business. The new tax should apply to all pensions received by individuals whose pension is a result of their employment within an industry where government funding of £1,000,000,000 or more has been required at anytime within their last 5 years of service with the company. Such loans should be designated trigger government loans. The new tax on the pension of these affected employees, to be charged on all pensions above £90,000 in any year, will be at the rate of 100% of all pension above the £90,000 threshold. Such tax to be reviewed annually and can only be discontinued once the parent company has repaid in full all such trigger government loans.
